column5: With the Democratic takeover of the executive and legislative branches a few days away Big Tech has swung into action in a big way to suppress conservative speech. The treatment of President Trump is of course the leading indicator. Here is a compilation of the developing stories as of this morning:  â€¢ Ebony Bowden New York Post: â€œTrump permanently suspended from Twitter accountâ€ â€¢ Salvador Rodriguez CNBC: â€œTrump tweets from POTUS handle account says looking â€˜at the possibilities of building out our own platformâ€™â€ Key points: President Donald Trump continued tweeting Friday evening using the government-owned @POTUS account despite having his @realDonaldTrump account permanently suspended by Twitter earlier in the day. The tweets were removed from the service almost immediately.
